document.full_text: twenty-five years after the south by southwest music festival emerged as a showcase for new bands, it has become as big and eclectic as pop culture itself with spotlights on movies and, increasingly, high-tech.
document.title: sxsw goes high-tech to cut through media clutter
lines_and_colors: twenty-five years after the south by southwest music festival emerged as a showcase for new bands, it has become as big and eclectic as pop culture itself with spotlights on movies and, increasingly, high-tech.
